name: Elephant Hunter Hunter
description:
Elephants are being hunted to extinction by devious hunters. Do your duty and put a stop to it with your trusty space laser!

As you progress in your defence of the kind-natured pachyderms unlock and upgrade five extra tools to help in your mammoth task. You'll need them as hunters never play fair!

This is my first release on Itch so please let me know if you encounter any bugs!

Controls:

  • Look around with the mouse
  • Fire Laser/Use Ability with the Left Mouse button
  • Select Ability with Number keys
  • Access Pause menu with Escape key
